title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: W. Storer How to Orlando Brown, October 5, 1865
summary: How recounts his organization of his sub-district, and gives a general evaluation of the condition of former slaves, including their developing relations with whites.
keywords: Aid/Relief, Administration/Bureaucracy, Education, Employment/Labor, Local Government, Patriotism, Property, Race Relations, Women, Economy, American Civil War
